SVGTextContentElement.summary: The SVGTextContentElement interface is implemented by elements that support rendering child text content. It is inherited by various text-related interfaces, such as , , and .

SVGTextContentElementGetCharNumAtPositio.summary: The getCharNumAtPosition() method of the interface represents the character which caused a text glyph to be rendered at a given position in the coordinate system. Because the relationship between characters and glyphs is not one-to-one, only the first character of the relevant typographic character is returned.

remarks.para: If no character is found at the specified position, -1 is returned.

SVGTextContentElementGetCharNumAtPositio.returns: A long; the index of the character that corresponds to the position.

SVGTextContentElementGetComputedTextLeng.summary: The getComputedTextLength() method of the interface represents the computed length for the text within the element.

SVGTextContentElementGetEndPositionOfCha.summary: The getEndPositionOfChar() method of the interface returns the trailing position of a typographic character after text layout has been performed.
SVGTextContentElementGetEndPositionOfCha.returns: A object; the position of the character in user coordinates.

SVGTextContentElementGetExtentOfChar.summary: The getExtentOfChar() method of the interface the represents computed tight bounding box of the glyph cell that corresponds to a given typographic character.
SVGTextContentElementGetExtentOfChar.returns: A object; the tight bounding box of the specified character.

SVGTextContentElementGetNumberOfChars.summary: The getNumberOfChars() method of the interface represents the total number of addressable characters available for rendering within the current element, regardless of whether they will be rendered.

SVGTextContentElementGetRotationOfChar.summary: The getRotationOfChar() method of the interface the represents the rotation of a typographic character.
SVGTextContentElementGetRotationOfChar.returns: A float; the rotation angle of the character in degrees.

SVGTextContentElementGetStartPositionOfC.summary: The getStartPositionOfChar() method of the interface returns the position of a typographic character after text layout has been performed.
SVGTextContentElementGetStartPositionOfC.returns: A object; the position of the character in user coordinates.

SVGTextContentElementGetSubStringLength.summary: The getSubStringLength() method of the interface represents the computed length of the formatted text advance distance for a substring of text within the element.

remarks.para: Note that this method only accounts for the widths of the glyphs in the substring and any extra spacing inserted by the CSS letter-spacing and word-spacing properties. Visual spacing adjustments made by the x attribute are ignored.

SVGTextContentElementLengthAdjust.summary: The lengthAdjust read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("lengthAdjust")}} attribute of the given element. It takes one of the LENGTHADJUST_* constants defined on this interface.

SVGTextContentElementTextLength.summary: The textLength read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("textLength")}} attribute of the given element.
